summary: An old soldier kidnaps a young General of an enemy state and takes him on a long journey to collect the reward.
cast: Jackie Chan|Leehom Wang|Sung-jun Yoo|Peng Lin|Yuming Du|Song Jin|Dongmei Xu|Ken Lo|Rongguang Yu|Yue Wu|Baoqiang Wang|Ben Niu|Wing Lun Ng|Jack Tu|Haixiang Wang|Zheng Yang|Jerry Liau|Yanlong Yan|Ning Xu|Yaodong Zhao|Tao Ji|Zha Ka|Gangte Mu'er|Jirghal Uning|Baisi Guleng|Bilige Aotegen|Puribu Siriji|Batetuerji Ba|Gexige Baoyin|Huntun Batu|Ziyi Wang|Yanshi Wang|Changzheng Zhang|Jingke Liang|Rong Rong Wu|Qingmin Shen|Xu Wang|Fan Yang|Bin Wang|Jin Guan|Woo-Ping Yuen|Gang Li|Jian Ming Huang|Sheng Ding|Jun He|Guanhua Han
title: Pequeño gran guerrero
